channel.title: Pages on Robert's Flummox Capacitor
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Robert's Flummox Capacitor

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is Robert Terakedis. I’m a Microsoft-based datacenter engineer turned Senior Technical Marketing Architect at VMware. Apple mobility management is my jam. Workspace ONE UEM is my bread & butter. More specifically, I’ve been in the Tech industry since 2002. I’ve held various roles spanning Microsoft-platform datacenter support and engineering (Exchange, Hyper-V infrastructure, Citrix, etc). In 2014, I moved into a new role dealing with Apple device management in the Enterprise.

item.title: Getting Started with Apple Device Management
item.description: One of the most common questions I get is where a device administrator can get started learning about Apple device management with Workspace ONE. More to come on this topic shortly!

item.title: Sticker Templates
item.description: Stickers As it so happens, I found a fun new hobby creating stickers in ProCreate on my iPad Pro with the 2nd Gen Apple Pencil. Hopefully you enjoy these – if you decide to print any as stickers, be sure to send me one!
